GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Listen to the video of people talking about times in different countries and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
Pippa: Mackie Street? I don’t know it. How do
I get there?
Alex: Are you coming by car?
Pippa: Yeah, I think so.
Alex: Well you know the new supermarket?
Well, you go past the supermarket
carry on for about a
hundred metres …
Pippa: Okay …
Alex: … and then you come to a set of traffic lights
Pippa: Yeah, I’m with you …
Alex: … go straight on at the traffic lights,
and that's Manor Road …
Pippa: Manor Road, okay.
Alex: That’s right. Then it’s the second left …
Pippa: … after the lights.
Alex: That’s it.
Pippa: Got it. See you there!
Alex: See you then.
